website_summaries.verdict: The 18-55mm OIS Zoom NX Lens is one of two kit lenses for Samsung's NX camera system. Bundled with your camera, it's a good value, but purchased on its own, it's overpriced.

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: A great upgrade over the 20-50mm lens! Very quick focus, sharp images, and the image stabilization is fantastic as well. It is physically larger than the 20-50mm, but it's well worth it. Not a whole lot else needs to be said, this guy is excellent. Attached are a couple unedited photos I snapped in the Dominican Republic using this lens.
customer_reviews.author: Vioxx

customer_reviews.title: Better and sharper image quality and faster focus
customer_reviews.text: Replacing the 20-50mm kit lens that came with the NX2000 with this amazing 18-55mm zoom lens. Although this lens was also a kit lens but the size is bigger and feel more solid than the smaller 20-50mm. This lens is sharper and focus faster than the 20-50mm lens, and it won't move when autofocus. The image quality is better. I also update its firmware for the NX1 ready. If you don't care about the bigger size, I suggest this lens for every NX camera.
customer_reviews.author: cutie19

customer_reviews.title: quick focus, rarely hunts, well built
customer_reviews.text: This is the primary lens on my NX20. The 18-55's very quick auto focus alone makes it well worth the price. It rarely hunts. The OIS is a good thing, especially with macro photos. Solidly built, proper metal bayonet, good shade. If I start shooting serious videos I'll wish the very quiet autofocus was dead silent (should give this 4.5 stars for that reason). Maybe an external mic would solve that. The 20-55 that came with my now-rarely-used NX1000 was excellently optically (I make big prints) but was no good for portraits because it hunts far too much...so it's also rarely used. Lesson: you get what you pay for with kit lenses.

product_meta.title: Samsung NX 18-55mm Zoom Camera Lens (Black)
product_meta.description:
The 18-55mm zoom lens is the perfect companion for any Samsung compact system camera. Made for use in all general conditions, this all-round lens helps you create beautiful portraits, amazing landscapes and everything in between. Its small, lightweight design offers excellent portability; travel anywhere without feeling weighed down by camera equipment. The intuitive i-Function feature gives users one-touch access to all your camera's manual settings. Adjust the aperture, shutter speed and more with just a twist of the lens while previewing the image in real-time. This 18-55mm compact zoom lens is compatible with all Samsung NX Compact System Cameras.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The Samsung EX-S1855CSBUS 18-55mm NX zoom lens is an ideal companion for Samsung's compact system cameras. Made for general use, this versatile lens lets you take great shots from landscapes to portraits to everything in between. And thanks to its lightweight, compact design, it won't weigh you down on your travels.

i-Function offers one-touch access to your camera's manual settings. View larger.

Versatile lens with 18-55mm zoom range lets you take great shots from landscapes to portraits. View larger.

18-55MM ZOOM WITH OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZATION FOR SHARP PHOTOS
The EX-S1855CSBUS has a versatile zoom range of 18-55mm (equivalent to 27.7-84.7mm in 35mm format), making it a great lens to leave on your camera for any occasion. The lens features optical image stabilization, which automatically makes tiny lens-shifts to cancel out shaking hands. The lens has a maximum aperture from F3.5 - 5.6 across the focal range. 

FAST AUTO-FOCUS FOR CRISP PHOTOS ALL THE TIME
The Samsung EX-S1855CSBUS uses a quick and accurate contrast autofocus system that focuses in approximately 170ms (0.17 seconds). You'll be able to capture even the most spontaneous moments in perfect focus. 

ONE-TOUCH ACCESS TO CONTROLS WITH I-FUNCTION
Samsung's i-Function feature gives you easy one-touch access to your camera's manual settings. You'll be able to adjust shutter speed, aperture, and more with just a push of a button and twist of the lens. You'll even be able to preview the settings in real time, so you can see how the settings affect your shot before you take it. Whether you're an expert or enthusiast, the intuitive i-Function feature will give you professional results. 

COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT FOR CARRYING EVERYWHERE
The EX-S1855CSBUS features a compact and light design that makes it comfortable to leave on your camera all the time. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung EX-S1855CSBUS 18-55mm lens for NX mount cameras and lens hood. 

EX-S1855CSBUS 18-55MM LENS
AT A GLANCE:
 * 18-55mm (30.8-77mm equivalent) zoom lens for Samsung NX mount cameras
 * Optical Image Stabilization for sharper shots
 * i-Function for quick access to manual settings
 * Fast autofocus lets you capture spontaneous moments
 * Compact, lightweight design for portability
